doc.title: Signature Series: Martina Navratilova
doc.plot: The 60 min documentary is a first person account of the life and times of Martina Navratilova, from her childhood under a repressive communist regime in Czechoslovakia, through her defection to her unparalleled achievements on and off the court as an American citizen. Arguably the greatest tennis player of all time, Martina will narrate the moments from her life giving you unique insight into what she was thinking and feeling during the highest and lowest moments of her professional career and personal life.
